quest.name: Hells Open
journal: Alisaie is ready to depart Ala Ghiri when you are.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We have a fair bit of ground to cover, so we should split up. If you come across any imperial soldiers, you know what to do.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Oh, and so you know─I sent word to Arenvald's squadron. They are already searching other nearby areas, so we have allies in the event we encounter anything beyond our means.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ah, give me a moment, Forename.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text:
Say that again, if you would.
...Hmm. No, maintain your distance for now.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Understood. Keep me apprised of any developments.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: That was Arenvald. The pair that was spying on us in the Fringes has followed us here...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: What about you, Forename? Any trouble?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...And there I was thinking we might be due for some peace and quiet. Glad to hear you dealt with them.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I hope the assault on Specula Imperatoris is going well...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: By the Twelve, did you see that!? The main tower just collapsed!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You heard it too, didn't you? It must have been the cannon at Castrum Abania. But that was an imperial installation, and their troops were still─

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Dammit, no one's responding! I don't know if the shell is being jammed or...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We have to go right now! They need our help!
